articles.description: If you've noticed a change in your monthly cycle after getting vaccinated, you are not alone. Several women shared their stories with us, and we interviewed an OBGYN to get you some clarification on what's happening with your body.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- Anecdotal evidence from women around the country has led to questions about how COVID-19 vaccines may affect women's menstrual cycles.When ABC7 News reporter, Kate Larsen, posted the… [+2736 chars]

articles.title: Nashville to lift all coronavirus business and gathering restrictions by May 14 - Tennessean
articles.description: Nashville will end all capacity and operational restrictions on businesses and gatherings on May 14, but the mask mandate will continue.
articles.content:
